author: JimGio

text: A better version of my favorite roguelite, a genre I usually don't appreciate. Everything about this game is improved, except for the soundtrack which I find a lot weaker. A perfect game for quick sessions that sometimes end up eating more of your time than planned, I can see myself playing it sporadically over the next years until a sequel hits (if there's ever one). The simple gameplay mixed with random levels and tons of powerups makes it super addicting, and while luck can play a big part, I rarely feel like it completely defines my run's success. Love it!
